==Trivia==
* {{Transclude|Eternity in a Moment|YoiLeitmotif|section=1}}
* During [[The Almighty Arataki Great and Glorious Drumalong Festival]], an event from [[Version 2.7]], the most popular music score was ''Blossoms of Summer Night'' which accounted for 23.96% of the total number of music score challenges.
